archimate:Capability.name: CSR fulfillment
archimate:Capability.documentation: A CSR fulfillment application provides front end support for the application flows defined by the order management applications (cf. Order Management Applications).Note: Since CSRs are required to perform sales activities, it is expected that in a future Application Map version this application will encompass front end applications from the sales domain as well.

properties.value: CSR access to specific order CSR Jeopardy notifications handling CSR Order administration CSR Order Capture and Negotiation CSR Order Error resolution CSR Order take-over and relinquish CSR Orders Reporting Product Catalogue browsing
